wikipedia_page.main: Sir Samuel Isidore Salmon, CBE, JP (18 October 1900 – 10 November 1980) was a British politician, corporate executive, and philanthropist.

response: * Samuel Isidore Salmon (C): Cities of London and Westminster 1964–1967
